SEARCH
Package battleship.model

Klasse Data

java.lang.Object
battleship.model.Data
public class Data extends Object
Represents the data structure for managing game-related information in the Battleship game. It includes player and computer grids, ships, and ship lengths.

      The grid where the computer shoots at. It represents the player ships and their status.
